name: Houston, we have a problem.
description:
Houston, we have a problem.

Even the best pilots can have accidents.

There are always more platforms out in the dark...

Note : To see the introduction, you need to download the game, unzip, authorize and lunch "GameJam".  The browser failed to open the videos.

The introduction is also in the attached trailer.

Assets used: 

  • Cave Drips by everythingsound : https://freesound.org/s/199515/
  • Space Wind 01 by Prosser : https://freesound.org/s/233995/
  • spaceship explosion2.WAV by phantastonia : https://freesound.org/s/270613/
  • Music : Wasteland by Viscid : https://freemusicarchive.org/music/viscid/entropy/wasteland-1/
